headline: Meta Announces AI Agents for 40% of Support
summary: Meta reveals AI agent deployment across customer support, potentially affecting 2,000 contractor positions by Q3 2026.

headline: Goldman Sachs AI Initiative Restructures Tech Teams
summary: Goldman Sachs announces restructuring of technology teams as AI automation reduces need for manual data processing roles.

headline: New Study: 60% of Customer Service Jobs Automatable
summary: MIT researchers publish comprehensive study showing majority of customer service positions could be automated with current AI technology.
